comment: Dr. Li was a great professor, and her class is not difficult to do well in. The homework was a completion grade, and her quizzes and tests were all open textbooks (print textbooks). She had a project at the end of the year that you could gain extra credit for, and she also gave out other EC opportunities. She was very nice and accessible as well.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: From my experience with professor Li, as long as you show up to class and have the textbook, you are already on pace to pass the class. She allows you to use your textbook for quizzes/tests. With that being said, you still need to put in the effort if you want to get an A, tests are not difficult, but if you don't study, you won't get an A.

Professor Yizeng Li is very open to criticism. She posted two anonymous surveys to get a sense of the class feeling. What I did not like about her and the class is the class is very textbook heavy lectures. Test are hard, especially problems because past examples look nothing like it. The final project is not explained. Extra credit is given alot.

I strongly disagree with all the above feedbacks. The course itself is very hard and lot of material to cover. I failed the first test with the low grade but talked to her and she is always willing to help. One of the best professor I have ever taken. Pay attention in class and do your homework you will be fine. She gives lots of extra credit. A+
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: As the other reviews say this Professor is the worst! She reads directly from the book, you have to teach yourself the material, and if you derive formulas and do not show on the quizzes and exams you'll be lucky to get a point, and that's if you solve it correctly. And to comment on the testing,the practice does not relate at all! AVOID PLEASE!!!!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Lectures are dull and from the book. You feel like the best isn't good enough for her. the Review Research she has you do is torture because you need to read 5 what seem like graduate school research papers. She expect us to understand a course that should honestly be split into 2 classes. It's just too much to handle for one semester. Do not take

comment: Ignorant, self centered and oblivious. That's the best to describe her. Trying your best isn't even enough for her. I leaned nothing about heat transfer from her. Just understood some ridiculous derivation of formulas that's given in the book! One of the most stressful classes I've ever taken. And she makes it worst everyday.

I highly recommend to avoid this professor. Even if you must take the class. It is not worth it. Her power points and examples are all from the book, but her hw and tests are nothing like it. If you like solving problems using advanced math take her. She's hard to understand is absolutely unhelpful when you need help. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS!
